SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id

UPDATE basic_app_installer
app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
version = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
installer_name = #{installerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
